articles.title: Hooper: NRL will blow up the 2020 draw and start again. Here’s how it will work - Fox Sports
articles.description: The NRL will begin work on a completely new draw this week as rugby league continues to be at the forefront of Australian sport by pioneering a way out of the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
The old draw will be blown up for a new-look competition structure from scratch and will involve the usual heavy consultation with broadcasters Fox Sports and Channel 9 and is unlikely to be released until the end of next week at the earliest.

articles.author: Phil Lutton
articles.title: The big issue on the minds of returning NRL players ... coffee - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Strict biosecurity measures? No worries. But how to ensure a steady dose of coffee was among the questions from NRL players as they reconvened on Monday.
articles.content: "It was mainly the simple questions can we go to the cafe and grab a coffee, can we go to the shopping centre and get some groceries. Who can you go and see and who cant you go and see? Just simple day-to-day stuff. We got a lot of clarity, the staff as well,… [+2226 chars]
